reviewText: Got this for my Mom. Returned 1st as it wouldn't play on her DVD player. Neither will the replacement one.

Be careful, I've ordered two different versions of this DVD and neither play on a U.S. DVD player...it's made for European players only.  It doesn't state that on the Amazon write up, but it won't play on either of my DVD players, and I get an error message telling me it's the wrong format.
